abilities.Name: Breaker
abilities.text: [color=green]Response[/color]: After you block with this card, your rival’s next check to play a card gets -<rating>.

abilities.Name: Combo
abilities.text: Combo-restricted abilities on this card are only playable if the printed properties of the directly preceding card(s) in the card pool match the requirement(s) of a Combo keyword on this card, in order

abilities.Name: Deflect
abilities.text: [color=green]Response[/color] [Hand] Add this card to the card pool: Before the damage step of a rival attack, that attack gets -<rating> damage. Only 1 Deflect ability can be played per attack

abilities.Name: Desperation
abilities.text: While you are at desperation, this card's difficulty is <rating>.

abilities.Name: EX
abilities.text: [color=orange]Enhance[/color] Discard 1 or more momentum: This attack gets +<rating> speed for each card used to pay the cost of this ability.

abilities.Name: Echo
abilities.text: [color=green]Response[/color] Discard 1 momentum: After this attack resolves, you may play it as your next form. If you do, after it resolves, flip it.

abilities.Name: Elusive
abilities.text: This backup cannot be attacked by a rival’s first attack each turn.

abilities.Name: Flash
abilities.text: Skip this attack’s Enhance Step.

abilities.Name: Frenzy
abilities.text: [color=pink]Blitz[/color]: This attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage for each attack that has been blocked this turn.

abilities.Name: Gauge
abilities.text: [color=orange]Enhance[/color]: If this attack deals <rating> or more damage, you may search your deck and discard pile for a character card that shares a name with your starting character and add it to your staging area.

abilities.Name: Multiple
abilities.text: [color=orange]Enhance[/color] Discard up to X momentum (minimum 1, maximum the Multiple rating): Add X cards from the top of your deck to your card pool face down as multiple copies of this attack. Add those attacks to the attack stack. Multiple copies are face down attacks that copy all the printed values of the original attack except the text box( which includes its keywords), they cannot be added to your momentum for any reason, anytime something attempts to add them they will be sent to discard instead.

abilities.Name: Only
abilities.text: This card cannot be played unless your identity is [Character Name].

abilities.Name: Powerful
abilities.text: [color=orange]Enhance[/color] Discard 1 or more momentum: This attack gets +<rating> damage for each card used to pay the cost of this ability.

abilities.Name: Reversal
abilities.text: [color=green]Response[/color] [Hand] Play this card as a reversal: After your opponent’s blocked attack resolves, add this attack to the attack stack. You can only play 1 reversal per block.

abilities.Name: Safe
abilities.text: Attacks cannot be played as a reversal to this attack.

abilities.Name: Shift
abilities.text: As this card clears from your card pool during your End Phase, if you played it, you may build it transformed (opposite side up).

abilities.Name: Stun
abilities.text: [color=orange]Enhance[/color]: Your rival commits <rating> foundations.

abilities.Name: Tension
abilities.text: [color=pink]Blitz[/color]: Add 1 Roman Cancel token to your momentum.

abilities.Name: Terrain
abilities.text: After this card is added to your stage, destroy all other terrain cards.

abilities.Name: Throw
abilities.text: If this attack is completely blocked, it deals half damage (rounded up) during the Damage Step.

abilities.Name: Unique
abilities.text: While this card is in your stage, if there are 2 or more copies of it in your stage, sacrifice the copy that was most recently added.
